column8: Hybrid character-level encoder (Per-field CNN -> Transformer) producing embeddings
SignedAmount included as a learnable feature inside the encoder

- Field-specific small CNN encoders (one encoder per field)
- Transformer over field vectors
- SignedAmount encoded INSIDE the neural encoder (learnable projection)

- Per-field small CNN encoder (captures local char patterns)
- Transformer encoder *over field vectors* (cross-field attention)
per filed samll CNN encoder and transfomer encoder with cross entropy loss
